Class MainController

extends java.lang.Object

    TThe controller class for the MainForm

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      javafx.scene.control.Button deletePartBtn
      If the user has a part selected in the Parts table then on hitting this Delete button they will see a confirmation asking them if they really want to delete the Part.
      javafx.scene.control.Button deleteProductBtn
      On press the user will see a confirmation asking if they are sure they wish to delete the selected Product in the Product table.
      private static Inventory inventory
      Holds the set of all Products and all Parts
      javafx.scene.control.TextField partsSearchField
      Users enters a string or id number into this text input field and when they press enter the Parts table will refresh displaying the set of parts containing either a matching id number or a substring of the search string entered.
      javafx.scene.control.TableView partTable
      Holds the set of all parts when there is no search query in the Parts search text field, and shows the Parts that match the search query when there is one.
      javafx.scene.control.TextField productsSearchField
      Users enters a string or id number into this text input field and when they press enter the Products table will refresh displaying the set of Products containing either a matching id number or a substring of the search string entered.
      javafx.scene.control.TableView productTable
      Holds the set of all products when there is no search query in the Products search text field, and shows the Products that match the search query when there is one.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void getPartSearchResultsHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Executed when the user presses Enter in the PartsSearchField If the string is empty the table will show all of the Parts in the Inventory, otherwise the table will show all parts containing the search string as a string or with a matching id number
      void getProductSearchResultsHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Executed when the user presses Enter in the ProductsSearchField If the string is empty the table will show all of the Products in the Inventory, otherwise the table will show all Products containing the search string as a string or with a matching id number
      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Sets listeners to filter all the text fields input and sets the product being modified as well as populates all the tables
      void initPartTable()
      Initializes the Parts table with 3 parts
      void initProductTable()
      Initializes the Product table with 3 Products
      void OnDeletePartBtnClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      When the user clicks the Delete Part Button they will see a confirmation asking them if they really want to delete If there is no Part selected, no Part will be deleted
      void OnDeleteProductBtnClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      When the user clicks the Delete Part Button they will see a confirmation asking them if they really want to delete If there is no Part selected, no Part will be deleted RUNTIME ERROR - If product is not checked for null, a NullPointer exception can happen at runtime.
      void onExitBtnClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Executed with the user clicks the exit button.
      void toAddPartForm​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Leaves the MainForm and the program goes to the AddPartForm after user clicks the Add button under the Parts table.
      void toAddProductForm​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Leaves the MainForm and the program goes to the AddProductForm after user clicks the Add button under the Products table.
      void toModifyPartForm​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Leaves the MainForm and the program goes to the ModifyPartForm after user clicks the Add button under the Parts table.
      void toModifyProductForm​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Leaves the MainForm and the program goes to the ModifyProductForm after user clicks the Add button under the Products table.

    • Field Detail

      • partsSearchField

        public javafx.scene.control.TextField partsSearchField
        Users enters a string or id number into this text input field and when they press enter the Parts table will refresh displaying the set of parts containing either a matching id number or a substring of the search string entered.

      • partTable

        public javafx.scene.control.TableView partTable
        Holds the set of all parts when there is no search query in the Parts search text field, and shows the Parts that match the search query when there is one. Users can select a Part from this table to Modify or Delete. They can also use the add button to add a Part to this table.

      • deletePartBtn

        public javafx.scene.control.Button deletePartBtn
        If the user has a part selected in the Parts table then on hitting this Delete button they will see a confirmation asking them if they really want to delete the Part. They can click "Ok" to delete the Part or "Cancel" to exit early without deleting. If no part is selected the user will see a Warning that says no part was selected for deletion.

      • productsSearchField

        public javafx.scene.control.TextField productsSearchField
        Users enters a string or id number into this text input field and when they press enter the Products table will refresh displaying the set of Products containing either a matching id number or a substring of the search string entered.

      • productTable

        public javafx.scene.control.TableView productTable
        Holds the set of all products when there is no search query in the Products search text field, and shows the Products that match the search query when there is one. Users can select a Product from this table to Modify or Delete. They can also use the add button to add a Product to this table.

      • deleteProductBtn

        public javafx.scene.control.Button deleteProductBtn
        On press the user will see a confirmation asking if they are sure they wish to delete the selected Product in the Product table. If there is no Product selected then the user will see a warning saying that there is no Product selected.

      • inventory

        private static Inventory inventory
        Holds the set of all Products and all Parts

      • OnDeletePartBtnClicked

        public void OnDeletePartBtnClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        When the user clicks the Delete Part Button they will see a confirmation asking them if they really want to delete If there is no Part selected, no Part will be deleted
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -

      • OnDeleteProductBtnClicked

        public void OnDeleteProductBtnClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        When the user clicks the Delete Part Button they will see a confirmation asking them if they really want to delete If there is no Part selected, no Part will be deleted RUNTIME ERROR - If product is not checked for null, a NullPointer exception can happen at runtime. I fixed this by checking to see if product was null before proceeding FUTURE ENHANCEMENT - This could be improved by greying out the delete button where there are no products in the table to delete
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -

      • getPartSearchResultsHandler

        public void getPartSearchResultsHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Executed when the user presses Enter in the PartsSearchField If the string is empty the table will show all of the Parts in the Inventory, otherwise the table will show all parts containing the search string as a string or with a matching id number
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - FUTURE ENHANCEMENT - This could be improved by adding regex search capabilities

      • getProductSearchResultsHandler

        public void getProductSearchResultsHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Executed when the user presses Enter in the ProductsSearchField If the string is empty the table will show all of the Products in the Inventory, otherwise the table will show all Products containing the search string as a string or with a matching id number
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -

      • onExitBtnClicked

        public void onExitBtnClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Executed with the user clicks the exit button. Exits the program immediately.
        Parameters:
